column6: Vampire X has gotten his fangs into Captain America! Now, that the country's biggest super hero is out of commission, the stakes are even higher.  Will Blade be able to help the Avengers hunt creatures of the night? Or are the heroes being prepped for a vampire main course?  It's a bloody battle of fangs and flesh like only superstars MARK MILLAR (KICK-ASS) and STEVE DILLON (PUNISHERMAX) can tell! Parental Advisory '$3.99
column8: | penciller:Olivier Coipel | penciller:Steve Dillon | writer:Mark Millar
